name: Crypton v2.0
body:
**What's new in v2.0**:

1. Discrete Logarithm Problem
   + [Cyclic Groups](https://github.com/ashutosh1206/Crypton/tree/master/Discrete-Logarithm-Problem#cyclic-groups)
   + [Lagrange's Theorem](https://github.com/ashutosh1206/Crypton/tree/master/Discrete-Logarithm-Problem#cyclic-groups)
   + [Naive approach](https://github.com/ashutosh1206/Crypton/tree/master/Discrete-Logarithm-Problem#brute-force)
     + [Explanation](https://github.com/ashutosh1206/Crypton/tree/master/Discrete-Logarithm-Problem#brute-force)
     + [Implementation](https://github.com/ashutosh1206/Crypton/blob/master/Discrete-Logarithm-Problem/brute.py)
   + [Baby Step Giant Step](https://github.com/ashutosh1206/Crypton/tree/master/Discrete-Logarithm-Problem/Algo-Baby-Step-Giant-Step#baby-step-giant-step-algorithm)
     + [Explanation](https://github.com/ashutosh1206/Crypton/tree/master/Discrete-Logarithm-Problem/Algo-Baby-Step-Giant-Step#algorithm)
     + [Implementation](https://github.com/ashutosh1206/Crypton/blob/master/Discrete-Logarithm-Problem/Algo-Baby-Step-Giant-Step/bsgs.py)
   + [Pohlig-Hellman](https://github.com/ashutosh1206/Crypton/tree/master/Discrete-Logarithm-Problem/Algo-Pohlig-Hellman#pohlig-hellman-algorithm)
     + [Explanation](https://github.com/ashutosh1206/Crypton/tree/master/Discrete-Logarithm-Problem/Algo-Pohlig-Hellman#pohlig-hellman-algorithm)
     + [Implementation](https://github.com/ashutosh1206/Crypton/blob/master/Discrete-Logarithm-Problem/Algo-Pohlig-Hellman/pohlig_hellman.py)   
   + [Pollard's Rho](https://github.com/ashutosh1206/Crypton/tree/master/Discrete-Logarithm-Problem/Algo-Pollard-Rho#pollard-rho-algorithm)
     + [Explanation](https://github.com/ashutosh1206/Crypton/tree/master/Discrete-Logarithm-Problem/Algo-Pollard-Rho#pollard-rho-algorithm)
     + [Implementation](https://github.com/ashutosh1206/Crypton/blob/master/Discrete-Logarithm-Problem/Algo-Pollard-Rho/pollardrho.py)
2. [Elliptic Curves](https://github.com/ashutosh1206/Crypton/tree/master/Elliptic-Curves#elliptic-curves)
   + Implementation of Elliptic Curve Arithmetic
     + [In sagemath](https://github.com/ashutosh1206/Crypton/blob/master/Elliptic-Curves/ellipticcurve.sage)
     + [In pure python](https://github.com/ashutosh1206/Crypton/blob/master/Elliptic-Curves/ellipticcurve.py)
   + Double and Add algorithm for Scalar Multiplication
     + [Explanation](https://github.com/ashutosh1206/Crypton/tree/master/Elliptic-Curves#double-and-add-algorithm)
     + [Implementation](https://github.com/ashutosh1206/Crypton/tree/master/Elliptic-Curves#double-and-add-algorithm)
3. [Elliptic Curve Discrete Logarithm Problem](https://github.com/ashutosh1206/Crypton/tree/master/Discrete-Logarithm-Problem/Elliptic-Curve-DLP)
   + [Cyclic Groups in Elliptic Curves](https://github.com/ashutosh1206/Crypton/tree/master/Discrete-Logarithm-Problem/Elliptic-Curve-DLP#defining-cyclic-group-over-elliptic-curves)
   + [Naive approach](https://github.com/ashutosh1206/Crypton/tree/master/Discrete-Logarithm-Problem/Elliptic-Curve-DLP#brute-force)
     + [Explanation](https://github.com/ashutosh1206/Crypton/tree/master/Discrete-Logarithm-Problem/Elliptic-Curve-DLP#brute-force)
     + [Implementation](https://github.com/ashutosh1206/Crypton/blob/master/Discrete-Logarithm-Problem/Elliptic-Curve-DLP/brute_ecdlp.py)
   + [Baby Step Giant Step](https://github.com/ashutosh1206/Crypton/tree/master/Discrete-Logarithm-Problem/Elliptic-Curve-DLP/Algo-Baby-Step-Giant-Step)
     + [Explanation](https://github.com/ashutosh1206/Crypton/tree/master/Discrete-Logarithm-Problem/Elliptic-Curve-DLP/Algo-Baby-Step-Giant-Step#baby-step-giant-step-algorithm)
     + [Implementation](https://github.com/ashutosh1206/Crypton/blob/master/Discrete-Logarithm-Problem/Elliptic-Curve-DLP/Algo-Baby-Step-Giant-Step/bsgs_ecdlp.py)
   + [Pollard's Rho](https://github.com/ashutosh1206/Crypton/tree/master/Discrete-Logarithm-Problem/Elliptic-Curve-DLP/Algo-Pollard-Rho)
     + [Explanation](https://github.com/ashutosh1206/Crypton/tree/master/Discrete-Logarithm-Problem/Elliptic-Curve-DLP/Algo-Pollard-Rho#pollard-rho-algorithm-for-solving-ecdlp)
     + [Implementation](https://github.com/ashutosh1206/Crypton/blob/master/Discrete-Logarithm-Problem/Elliptic-Curve-DLP/Algo-Pollard-Rho/pollardrho.py)
     + [CTF Challenges](https://github.com/ashutosh1206/Crypton/tree/master/Discrete-Logarithm-Problem/Elliptic-Curve-DLP/Algo-Pollard-Rho/Challenges)
4. [Identification Protocols](https://github.com/ashutosh1206/Crypton/tree/master/Identification)
   + [Identification basics](https://github.com/ashutosh1206/Crypton/tree/master/Identification#identification)
   + [Algorithms for identification](https://github.com/ashutosh1206/Crypton/tree/master/Identification#algorithms-for-identification)
   + [Naive algorithm](https://github.com/ashutosh1206/Crypton/tree/master/Identification#trivial-algorithm)
   + [Ephemeral Key Authentication](https://github.com/ashutosh1206/Crypton/tree/master/Identification/Ephemeral-Key-Auth)
     + [Internals](https://github.com/ashutosh1206/Crypton/tree/master/Identification/Ephemeral-Key-Auth#ephemeral-key-authentication)
     + [Forging Identity](https://github.com/ashutosh1206/Crypton/tree/master/Identification/Ephemeral-Key-Auth#forging-identity)
     + [CTF Challenges](https://github.com/ashutosh1206/Crypton/tree/master/Identification/Ephemeral-Key-Auth/Challenges)
5. [Diffie Hellman Key Exchange](https://github.com/ashutosh1206/Crypton/tree/master/Diffie-Hellman-Key-Exchange)
   + [Key Exchange internals](https://github.com/ashutosh1206/Crypton/tree/master/Diffie-Hellman-Key-Exchange#introduction)
   + [Trivial implementation](https://github.com/ashutosh1206/Crypton/blob/master/Diffie-Hellman-Key-Exchange/example.py)
   + [Small Subgroup Confinement Attack](https://github.com/ashutosh1206/Crypton/tree/master/Diffie-Hellman-Key-Exchange/Attack-Small-Subgroup-Confinement)
     + [Explanation](https://github.com/ashutosh1206/Crypton/tree/master/Diffie-Hellman-Key-Exchange/Attack-Small-Subgroup-Confinement#small-subgroup-confinement-attack)
     + [CTF Challenges](https://github.com/ashutosh1206/Crypton/tree/master/Diffie-Hellman-Key-Exchange/Attack-Small-Subgroup-Confinement/Challenges)
   + [Invalid Curve Point Attack](https://github.com/ashutosh1206/Crypton/tree/master/Diffie-Hellman-Key-Exchange/Attack-Invalid-Curve-Point)
     + [Explanation](https://github.com/ashutosh1206/Crypton/tree/master/Diffie-Hellman-Key-Exchange/Attack-Invalid-Curve-Point#invalid-curve-point-attack)
     + [Implementation](https://github.com/ashutosh1206/Matasano-Crypto-Challenges/tree/master/set8/p59)
     + [CTF Challenges](https://github.com/ashutosh1206/Crypton/tree/master/Diffie-Hellman-Key-Exchange/Attack-Invalid-Curve-Point/Challenges)
6. [Least Significant Bit Oracle Attack on unpadded RSA](https://github.com/ashutosh1206/Crypton/tree/master/RSA-encryption/Attack-LSBit-Oracle)
   + [Explanation](https://github.com/ashutosh1206/Crypton/tree/master/RSA-encryption/Attack-LSBit-Oracle#least-significant-bit-oracle-attack)
   + [Implementation](https://github.com/ashutosh1206/Crypton/blob/master/RSA-encryption/Attack-LSBit-Oracle/lsbitoracle.py)
   + [CTF Challenges](https://github.com/ashutosh1206/Crypton/blob/master/RSA-encryption/Attack-LSBit-Oracle/encrypt.py)
7. [Extracting modulus from an unpadded RSA encryption service](https://github.com/ashutosh1206/Crypton/tree/master/RSA-encryption/Attack-Retrieve-Modulus)
   + [Explanation](https://github.com/ashutosh1206/Crypton/tree/master/RSA-encryption/Attack-Retrieve-Modulus#retrieve-rsa-modulus)
   + [Implementation](https://github.com/ashutosh1206/Crypton/blob/master/RSA-encryption/Attack-Retrieve-Modulus/extractmod.py)
   + [CTF Challenges](https://github.com/ashutosh1206/Crypton/tree/master/RSA-encryption/Intro-Challenges/)
8. Modified ElGamal encryption
   + [Explanation](https://github.com/ashutosh1206/Crypton/tree/master/Elgamal-Encryption#elgamal-encryption)
   + [Implementation](https://github.com/ashutosh1206/Crypton/blob/master/Elgamal-Encryption/example.py)
9. Added CTF challenges
   + [Coppersmith's Attack](https://github.com/ashutosh1206/Crypton/commit/7e34fbfa7e36f9edde9f2984ee1f85fce8c33e4f)
